attributes.action: Allow the Police and Security Services to use DPI  ( Deep Packet Inspection ) and other products already commercially used by non government agencies
attributes.additional_details:
Allow the Police and Security Services to use DPI  ( Deep Packet Inspection ) and other products already commercially used by non government agencies

Allow the police and security services to use matched DPI ( Deep Packet Inspection) products and other products that are currently available or already commercially and being used by ISP's ( Internet Service Providers) and equivalent mobile tech and real time reporting.

Reason:

This technology is already being used everyday by ISP's and DPI is used already by other governments abroad, what should our police and security services not be allowed to do their job using already available technology?

rejection.details: This is an operational policing matter for police forces and Police and Crime Commissioners.
